page.title: 17A Day In A Life Of A Mother.
page.content: 7.30Got up. Breakfast:grapefruit,toast, coffee. Made children's packed lunches. Fed dog:drops in eyes to clear up con- junctivitis. Family left for the day. 8.40 Went to bathroom.Washed up dishes while listening to Radio 4. Made beds. Put away clean clothes. Weeded garden. Had some coffee.Walked dog.Made lunch. 12.30 Lunch:jacket potato,cheese,salad, yoghurt,tea.Chatted to father-in-law. 1.30Went to work in an antique shop in Witney. Spent the afternoon doing up furniture.Husband took me home. Had a drink and biscuit. Went fruit picking with family. Returned home. Took dog for walk with daughter. Made evening meal. 7.00 Tea:salad,strawberries and cream. Watered garden. Watched T.V. Had a drink. 10.30 Fell asleep in front of T.V. 12.00 Woke up. Got ready for bed.
